downloadTitle: Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.2)
downloadDescription: This tool helps create and manage the Enterprise Mode Site List in the v.2 XML schema for Enterprise Mode.
detailsSection: This tool lets IT Professionals create and update the Enterprise Mode Site List in the version 2.0 (v.2) XML schema. The Enterprise Mode schema has been updated to v.2 to be easier to read and to provide a better foundation for future capabilities. The v.2 schema is supported on Windows 7, Windows 8.1, and Windows 10. The v.1 XML schema will also continue to be supported on Windows 7, Windows 8.1, and Windows 10.
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating System
Windows 10 Build 10586 and higher

Minimum Requirements
                         • Computer/Processor: 233MHz processor or higher (Pentium processor recommended)
                         • Memory: 512MB
                         • Available hard drive space: 70MB
                         • Display: Super VGA (800 x 600 resolution, or higher) monitor with 256 colors
                         • Peripherals: Internet connection
                         • Additional technology: Microsoft .NET Framework 4
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
